author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Try to factorize a ddalgorithm used for forward pixel which can help in adopting legacy scenario to dd4hep

#### PR validation:

Tested by dumping the old and new scenario of forward pixel 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run2-gex131 Try to factorize a ddalgorithm used for forward pixel which can help in adopting legacy scenario to dd4hep
